entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
